data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Capital do Movel have now been confirmed.
Joao Bento starts the match. Pacos Ferreira with the kick-off in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 2, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Gustavo Assuncao (Famalicao) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 6, Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 7, Jhonata Robert (Famalicao) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Bruno Costa of Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pacos de Ferreira.
Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 16, Srdan Babic for Famalicao has been booked by Joao Bento and receives a first yellow card.
Joao Bento signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 18, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Luther Singh.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Bruno Costa (Pacos Ferreira) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Bento awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 26, Pacos Ferreira's Stephen Eustaquio breaks free at Estadio Capital do Movel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 28, Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In Pacos de Ferreira, Famalicao push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 31, Joao Bento signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 32, Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Douglas Tanque's finish is wide of the goal.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
Gustavo Assuncao for Famalicao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Douglas Tanque is booked for the home team.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Famalicao in Pacos de Ferreira.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 37, Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 43, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Famalicao with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Jordao is replacing Ivan Jaime for the away team.
Famalicao make their second substitution with Dyego Sousa replacing Joaquin Pereyra.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Joao Bento awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Famalicao.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 53, Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Famalicao defender.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 57, Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Famalicao to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Famalicao are coming forward and Dyego Sousa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pacos de Ferreira.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 61, Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Pacos Ferreira's Marco Baixinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Capital do Movel. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 63, Gil Dias for Famalicao drives towards goal at Estadio Capital do Movel. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Joao Bento signals a Famalicao throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Famalicao.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 65, Pepa is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Capital do Movel with Joao Amaral replacing Luther Singh.
Famalicao's Marcello Trotta has run offside.
In the minute 66, Calvin Verdonk is on a sub for Jhonata Robert for Famalicao.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helder Ferreira (Pacos Ferreira) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 70, Calvin Verdonk (Famalicao) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
Famalicao's Dyego Sousa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Pepa (Pacos Ferreira) is making a second substitution, with Uilton replacing Bruno Costa.
The home team replace Helder Ferreira with Mohamed Diaby.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marcello Trotta for Famalicao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Joao Bento signals a Famalicao throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 77, Attention is being given to Pacos Ferreiraâ€™s Jordi and play has been suspended briefly.
Jordi for Pacos Ferreira is back on the field again.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
In the minute 80, In Pacos de Ferreira a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Famalicao.
Oleg Reabciuk (Pacos Ferreira) has received a yellow card from Joao Bento.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 82, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Famalicao's Jordao has been booked in Pacos de Ferreira.
In the minute 84, Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pacos Ferreira's half?
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Guga is replacing Gil Dias for Famalicao at Estadio Capital do Movel.
In the minute 86, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Capital do Movel.
Dor Jan is on a sub for Douglas Tanque for Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 88, Famalicao to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! Pacos Ferreira extend their lead to 2-0 through Uilton.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Joao Bento will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Famalicao advance rapidly upfield but Joao Bento blows for offside.
Joao Bento signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
Gustavo Assuncao (Famalicao) has received a first yellow card.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Dor Jan for Pacos Ferreira who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
